title: AP qss AD zonyas
body: AP qss AD zonyas would make the game alot fairer since it allows counter play outside of champ select.enemy malzahar need a qss so play an ad champion ect.

replies.body:
What, did they delete mercurial scimitar or something?

Edit - I've always felt like it's better to just build a randuins or something - give yourself a bit of hp and armor to survive the burst.
If that fails, add in a frozen mallet. 
Don't just rush the cookie cutter adc build every game. If you are getting deleted by an assassin, swap that BORK for a Bloodthirster. Swap essence reaver for Frozen mallet. And chuck in your randuins/warmogs

Did people just forget about GA and how it basically revives adc's at half life now? Banshees? Maw? There are a ton of items that are designed for adc's defensively, randuins and warmogs, not so much LOL.

In my opinion AD champs don't need any more help than they already have.

But in saying that, i can't count the number of times that the ADC has bought a Zhonya's because they just cant do anything against Zed, and buying an AP item on the one champ that really really shouldn't have to, isn't something thats healthy for the game.
Zed is already nerfed enough. His ult shadow has 0.5 sec cd to shadow back, that 0.5 sec can get you killed :P. His ad got nerfed and now his w is 20 sec cd.

Zed's damage output is still enough to burst a full health squishy HIGH PRIORITY TARGET for an easy fight for the rest of his team, even if he had to pass straight through the frontline, he will still get the kill. Lategame Zed is almost guaranteed death for hypercarries.

The way it works is:
Mercurial Scimitar - Made for AD champions because they usually don't need to be taken out of combat for a few seconds. Their CD's are either relatively low or they are auto-attacked/lifesteal focussed.

Zhonya's Hourglass - Made for AP champions because whilst they're as squishy, if not squishier than AD champions, they need that few second timeout to clear their CDs.

Basically these two items are like brothers. The other way around might be a bit pointless because they technically do the same thing overall. If an adc zhonya'd they'd need spells or instant sustain to bring themselves back up afterwards or kill the enemy instantly.
